name: Jungle Animal Safari Hunt Sim
description:
Jungle Animal Safari Hunt Sim is all about thrill & fun. Wild animals are very smart and clever so to be a professional forest wild animal hunter you must have good aim and shooting skills while holding your breath and kill them.Test your sniper skills by choosing targets carefully; or go into assault mode as you clear the forest of the wild beasts!
Features!
- Realistic 3D Graphics.
- Such a wonderufl jungle environments.
- Very Smooth Controls
- Highlevel Sound Quality
- Multiple type of Animals
- Modern and Multiple level of Weapons
